bibl.title: Maamura Surveys: Preliminary Report.
bibl.note: Survey conducted by the Department for Underwater Antiquities in the gulf of Maamura, located 15 km east of Alexandria's Eastern Harbour. - 1999 campaign: Amphora field; - Anchors. - The other campaigns: the tanks. - Conclusion.
